segments.text: Jason . There ’ s a snag in the plans for the Hoover Center .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s wrong ? I thought everything was set .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it was . But the contractor ’ s just told me he ’ s not going to be able to finish by the twentieth , as planned .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we could work out an overtime schedule . It ’ s definitely worth it to finish by the twentieth .
segments.speaker: S2
